name: stoat
description: StoatChat is a self-hosted chat platform with channels, direct messages, and file sharing. It aims to be lightweight and easy to deploy for small communities.
features: Text channels: Creates channels for organized topic-based discussions.
Direct messaging: Sends private messages to individuals or groups.
File sharing: Uploads and shares files within channels.
User roles: Assigns permissions with customizable role system.
Message history: Stores and searches through message history.
Emoji reactions: Reacts to messages with emoji.
Markdown formatting: Formats messages with markdown syntax.
Notification settings: Customizes alerts per channel or conversation.
Lightweight design: Runs efficiently with minimal resource usage.
Self-contained: Easy deployment for small communities.
Mobile responsive: Chats from smartphones and tablets.
Open source: Auditable code for security and customization.
